name: Master the Whiteboard Challenge
description:
Are you looking for help practicing whiteboard design challenges? This template is for you! I provide a brief overview of what a whiteboard design challenge is, some tips and tricks, pitfalls to avoid, and then a template to use for your next challenge.


UPDATE Jan 26, 2021

  • Combined User Wants and User Needs into one section
  • Added new section for Business Goals and KPIs
  • Added new section for Business Opportunities
  • Added Effort/Value matrix to help prioritize solutions


Spectial thanks to Ellen Huang for some great feedback and great ideas to improve this template!
